name: base_vibe
description: Foundation vibe inherited by all engineering vibes. Contains core MCP tools and workflows used across all domains.

core_mcp_tools.name: graphiti
core_mcp_tools.purpose: Knowledge graph for capturing architectural decisions, preferences, and facts
when_to_use: Search for existing knowledge before implementing
Record debugging insights for future reference

core_mcp_tools.name: context7
when_to_use: Working with external APIs or frameworks
Looking up best practices for unfamiliar tech

core_mcp_tools.name: sequential-thinking
core_mcp_tools.purpose: Complex reasoning and multi-step problem solving
when_to_use: Debugging complex issues requiring systematic analysis

universal_rules: ALWAYS search Graphiti before implementing new patterns (avoid reinventing)
AFTER solving complex issues, document via Graphiti for future reference
FOR unfamiliar libraries, use Context7 to fetch latest docs
WHEN stuck, use sequential-thinking for systematic problem breakdown
Follow founder_rules.mdc for non-negotiable standards (naming, types, spelling)

before_starting: Search Graphiti for existing knowledge on the topic
during_work: Use vibe-specific MCP tools for domain tasks
Document discoveries via Graphiti as you learn
after_completing: Run quality checks (founder rules, linting, type checking)
Update relevant handoff docs if significant changes
Run smoke tests to verify functionality
